person.persName: Thomas S. Bronston, Jr. (Madison County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Richmond, Madison County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Ann Bronston in Madison County, Kentucky in June 1846. Father of Charles Bronston. Married to Elizabeth Ballard Bronston in Madison County on December 24, 1850. Father of Thomas B. Bronston. Married to Henrietta Bronston. Father of Joseph S. Bronston, Mattie Bronston, Nettie Bronston, Elen Bronston, Bettie Bronston, and Nannie Bronston. Merchant in Madison County in 1850. Merchant in Madison County in 1860. Enslaved eight persons in Madison County in 1860. Imprisoned at Camp Chase, Ohio in June 1862.
